security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and placeholder content. No executable code performs file operations, network calls, or command execution. Referenced scripts are planned placeholders that do not exist.

content.user_title: Lead QMS Audits for ISO 13485 Compliance
content.value_statement: Quality management system audits require deep regulatory knowledge and systematic methodology. This skill provides expert guidance for ISO 13485 audits, nonconformity identification, and corrective action verification.
actual_capabilities: Design and manage ISO 13485-compliant internal audit programs
Develop risk-based audit schedules and scope definitions
Conduct process-based audits across QMS core and support processes
Identify and classify nonconformities (major, minor, observations)
Guide corrective action verification and CAPA integration
Prepare organizations for regulatory inspections and certification audits
limitations: Does not execute audit procedures or access external systems
Cannot access or review actual quality management documents
Does not replace certified auditors for formal regulatory inspections
Limited to guidance and planning without direct system integration

use_cases.title: Plan Annual Audit Programs
use_cases.description: Develop comprehensive risk-based internal audit schedules aligned with ISO 13485 requirements and process criticality.

use_cases.title: Prepare for FDA Inspections
use_cases.description: Ready your organization for regulatory audits with systematic preparation guides and documentation checklists.

use_cases.title: Track CAPA Effectiveness
use_cases.description: Integrate audit findings with corrective action processes and verify effectiveness of implemented solutions.

prompt_templates.title: Create Audit Plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a risk-based quarterly audit plan for our medical device manufacturing QMS. Focus on design controls, production processes, and supplier management. Include auditor assignments and schedule.

prompt_templates.title: Prepare Audit Checklist
prompt_templates.prompt: Develop a comprehensive supplier quality audit checklist based on ISO 13485 Clause 7.4 requirements. Include specific questions for each subclause.

prompt_templates.title: Document Nonconformity
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me document a major nonconformity for design control procedures not being followed. Include the finding description, requirement reference, and suggested corrective action format.

prompt_templates.title: Verify CAPA Effectiveness
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a verification plan to assess the effectiveness of corrective actions implemented for a training records nonconformity. What evidence should we review?

output_examples.input: Create an audit plan for our design control process
output: Scope: ISO 13485 Clause 7.3 Design and Development
Key Focus Areas: Design inputs, outputs, review, verification, validation, transfer, changes, and documentation
Evidence Requirements: Design plans, specs, review records, test reports, DHF completeness
Finding Classification: Major, Minor, Observation, Best Practice

best_practices: Use risk-based prioritization to focus audit resources on high-impact processes
Document evidence thoroughly before classifying nonconformities
Verify corrective action effectiveness through follow-up audits, not just documentation review
anti_patterns: Auditing to a checklist without understanding process context and risks
Classifying findings without sufficient objective evidence
Closing CAPAs without verifying implementation and effectiveness

faq.question: Does this skill replace certified lead auditors?
faq.answer: No. This skill provides guidance but formal audits requiring lead auditor certification must be conducted by qualified professionals.

faq.question: Can I use this for FDA inspection preparation?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill includes regulatory inspection preparation guidance but does not provide legal compliance advice for specific situations.

faq.question: What ISO standards are covered?
faq.answer: Primary focus is ISO 13485:2016. The skill also references ISO 14971 for risk management and IEC 62304 for software audits.

faq.question: Does this skill access my QMS documents?
faq.answer: No. The skill provides templates and guidance but cannot access external files or systems without explicit user action.

faq.question: How do I integrate with existing CAPA systems?
faq.answer: The skill provides CAPA integration frameworks. You must transfer findings to your internal systems manually using the suggested formats.

faq.question: What is the difference between this and a general compliance skill?
faq.answer: This skill is specialized in QMS auditing with deep ISO 13485 expertise, auditor competency frameworks, and audit program management methodologies.
